trans-unit.source: Provides the underlying stream of data for network access.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder den underliggende datastrøm for nettverkstilgang.

trans-unit.source: The NetworkStream class provides methods for sending and receiving data over <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketType> sockets in blocking mode.
trans-unit.target: Klassen NetworkStream inneholder metoder for sending og mottak av data over <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketType>sockets i blokkerer modus.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketType>

trans-unit.source: For more information about blocking versus nonblocking <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>s, see [Using an Asynchronous Client Socket](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om blokkering sammenlignet med ikke-blokkerende <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>s, kan du se [ved hjelp av en asynkron klientsocket](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: You can use the NetworkStream class for both synchronous and asynchronous data transfer.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke klassen NetworkStream for både synkrone og asynkrone dataoverføring.

trans-unit.source: For more information about synchronous and asynchronous communication, see [Sockets](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om synkrone og asynkrone kommunikasjon [Sockets](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To create a NetworkStream, you must provide a connected <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil opprette en NetworkStream, må du angi en tilkoblet <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: You can also specify what <xref:System.IO.FileAccess> permission the NetworkStream has over the provided <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi hvilken <xref:System.IO.FileAccess>tillatelse av NetworkStream er over den angitte <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> </xref:System.IO.FileAccess>

trans-unit.source: By default, closing the NetworkStream does not close the provided <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: Som standard lukkes lukking av NetworkStream ikke den angitte <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: If you want the NetworkStream to have permission to close the provided <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, you must specify `true` for the value of the `ownsSocket` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil NetworkStream har tillatelse til å lukke den angitte <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, må du angi `true` for verdien for den `ownsSocket` parameteren.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A> methods for simple single thread synchronous blocking I/O.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A>og <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A>metoder for enkel én tråd synkron blokkerer i/u.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to process your I/O using separate threads, consider using the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndWrite%2A> methods, or the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndRead%2A> methods for communication.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil behandle din i/u med egne tråder, kan du vurdere å bruke den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A>og <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndWrite%2A>metoder, eller <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A>og <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndRead%2A>metoder for kommunikasjon.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndRead%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndWrite%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A>

trans-unit.source: The NetworkStream does not support random access to the network data stream.
trans-unit.target: NetworkStream støtter ikke RAM i nettverket dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanSeek%2A> property, which indicates whether the stream supports seeking, is always `false`; reading the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Position%2A> property, reading the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Length%2A> property, or calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Seek%2A> method will throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanSeek%2A>egenskap, som angir om Dataflyten støtter søking, er alltid `false`; lesing <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Position%2A>egenskapen lesing av <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Length%2A>egenskapen, eller kaller <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Seek%2A>metoden vil throw <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Seek%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Length%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Position%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanSeek%2A>

trans-unit.source: Read and write operations can be performed simultaneously on an instance of the NetworkStream class without the need for synchronization.
trans-unit.target: Lese og skrive kan utføres samtidig til en forekomst av klassen NetworkStream uten å måtte synkronisering.

trans-unit.source: As long as there is one unique thread for the write operations and one unique thread for the read operations, there will be no cross-interference between read and write threads and no synchronization is required.
trans-unit.target: Så lenge det finnes en unik tråd for skriveoperasjoner én unik tråd for leseoperasjoner, vil det være uten tvers-forstyrrelser mellom lese og skrive tråder, og ingen synkronisering er nødvendig.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref> class for the specified <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref> klasse for den angitte <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> is created with read/write access to the specified <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>Opprettes med lese-/ skrivetilgang til den angitte <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> does not own the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, so calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Close%2A> method does not close the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>Ikke eier den underliggende <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>så kaller <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Close%2A>metoden kan ikke lukke <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Close%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: If the value of `ownsSocket` parameter is `true`, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> takes ownership of the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, and calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Close%2A> method also closes the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien for `ownsSocket` parameteren er `true`, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>blir eier av den underliggende <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, og kaller <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Close%2A>metoden lukker også underliggende <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Close%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref> klasse for den angitte <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>med de angitte tilgangsrettighetene.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> is created with the specified access to the specified <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: Det <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>er opprettet med den angitte tilgangen til den angitte <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: With this constructor, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> does not own the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, so calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Close%2A> method does not close the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: Med denne konstruktøren, kan du <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>ikke eier den underliggende <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>kaller så <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Close%2A>metoden kan ikke lukke den underliggende <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Close%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: The `access` parameter sets the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanRead%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanWrite%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>.
trans-unit.target: Den `access` parameteren angir <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanRead%2A>og <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanWrite%2A>Egenskaper for <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanWrite%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you specify <xref:System.IO.FileAccess>, then the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> allows calls to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir <xref:System.IO.FileAccess>, vil <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>tillater kall til den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> </xref:System.IO.FileAccess>

trans-unit.source: If you specify <xref:System.IO.FileAccess>, then the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> allows calls to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir <xref:System.IO.FileAccess>, vil <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>tillater kall til den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> </xref:System.IO.FileAccess>

trans-unit.source: If you specify <xref:System.IO.FileAccess>, both method calls are allowed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir <xref:System.IO.FileAccess>, både metodekall er tillatt.</xref:System.IO.FileAccess>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> that the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref> will use to send and receive data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>som den <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref> skal bruke til å sende og motta data.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.IO.FileAccess"></xref> values that specify the type of access given to the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref> over the provided <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous read from the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Starter en asynkron lesing fra den <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The BeginRead method starts asynchronously reading data from the incoming network buffers.
trans-unit.target: Metoden BeginRead starter asynkron lesing av data fra innkommende nettverket bufferne.

trans-unit.source: Calling the BeginRead method gives you the ability to receive data within a separate execution thread.
trans-unit.target: Kaller metoden BeginRead gir deg muligheten til å motta data på en egen kjøring-tråd.

trans-unit.source: You must create a callback method that implements the <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate and pass its name to the BeginRead method.
trans-unit.target: Du må opprette en tilbakeringing metode som implementerer den <xref:System.AsyncCallback>delegere og sende navnet til metoden BeginRead.</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: At the very minimum, your `state` parameter must contain the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>.
trans-unit.target: På den svært minimums din `state` parameteren må inneholde <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: Because you will want to obtain the received data within your callback method, you should create a small class or structure to hold a read buffer and any other useful information.
trans-unit.target: Fordi du vil hente mottatte data i tilbakeringing metoden, må du opprette en liten klasse eller -strukturen har en lesebuffer og annen nyttig informasjon.

trans-unit.source: Pass the structure or class instance to the BeginRead method through the `state` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Sende forekomst structure eller klasse til metoden BeginRead via den `state` parameteren.

trans-unit.source: Your callback method should call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndRead%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden tilbakeringing må kalle den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndRead%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: When your application calls BeginRead, the system will wait until data is received or an error occurs, and then the system will use a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and blocks on <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndRead%2A> until the provided <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> reads data or throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Når programmet kaller BeginRead, systemet skal vente før data mottas eller det oppstår en feil, og deretter systemet bruker en separat tråd til å utføre den angitte tilbakeringing metoden og blokker på <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndRead%2A>før det angitte <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>leser data eller oppstår det et unntak.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want the original thread to block after you call the BeginRead method, use the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil den opprinnelige tråden til å blokkere når du kaller BeginRead-metoden, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.Set%2A> in the callback method when you want the original thread to continue executing.
trans-unit.target: Kall <xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.Set%2A>i metoden tilbakeringing når du ønsker den opprinnelige tråden fortsette kjøring.</xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.Set%2A>

trans-unit.source: For additional information about writing callback methods, see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om hvordan du skriver tilbakeringing metoder, se [formidling representant som en tilbakeringing metode](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The BeginRead method reads as much data as is available, up to the number of bytes specified by the `size` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Metoden BeginRead leser så mye data som er tilgjengelig, opptil antall byte som er angitt av den `size` parameteren.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you receive an <xref:System.IO.IOException>, check the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property to determine if it was caused by a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis du får en <xref:System.IO.IOException>må du kontrollere <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>til å fastslå om det ble forårsaket av en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.IO.IOException>

trans-unit.source: If so, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A> property to obtain the specific error code, and refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: Hvis dette er tilfellet, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A>til å hente feilkoden og i Windows Sockets versjon 2 API feil kode dokumentasjonen i MSDN for en detaljert beskrivelse av feilen.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Read and write operations can be performed simultaneously on an instance of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> class without the need for synchronization.
trans-unit.target: Lese og skrive operasjoner kan utføres samtidig til en forekomst av den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>klasse uten å måtte synkronisering.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: As long as there is one unique thread for the write operations and one unique thread for the read operations, there will be no cross-interference between read and write threads and no synchronization is required.
trans-unit.target: Så lenge det finnes en unik tråd for skriveoperasjoner én unik tråd for leseoperasjoner, vil det være uten tvers-forstyrrelser mellom lese og skrive tråder, og ingen synkronisering er nødvendig.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref:System.Byte> that is the location in memory to store data read from the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av typen <xref:System.Byte>som plasseringen i minne til å lagre dataene fra den <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref>.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: The location in `buffer` to begin storing the data.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen i `buffer` til å begynne å lagre dataene.

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to read from the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Antall byte ikke lese fra den <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate that is executed when BeginRead completes.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.AsyncCallback>representanten som kjøres når BeginRead er fullført.</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: An object that contains any additional user-defined data.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som inneholder en brukerdefinert datatype.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that represents the asynchronous call.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IAsyncResult>som representerer asynkront kall.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.target: The buffer parameter is .

trans-unit.target: Den offset parameteren er mindre enn 0.

trans-unit.source: -or- The offset parameter is greater than the length of the buffer paramater.
trans-unit.target: - eller - offset parameteren er større enn lengden på den buffer parameteren.

trans-unit.target: - eller - size er mindre enn 0.

trans-unit.source: The underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> is closed.
trans-unit.target: Den underliggende <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>er lukket.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: -or- There was a failure while reading from the network.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref> is closed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref> er lukket.

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous write to a stream.
trans-unit.target: Starter en asynkron skriving til en dataflyt.

trans-unit.source: The BeginWrite method starts an asynchronous send operation to the remote host.
trans-unit.target: Metoden BeginWrite starter en asynkron sendingsoperasjonen til den eksterne verten.

trans-unit.source: Calling the BeginWrite method gives you the ability to send data within a separate execution thread.
trans-unit.target: Kaller metoden BeginWrite gjør mulighet å sende data på en egen kjøring-tråd.

trans-unit.source: You must create a callback method that implements the <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate and pass its name to the BeginWrite method.
trans-unit.target: Du må opprette en tilbakeringing metode som implementerer den <xref:System.AsyncCallback>delegere og sende navnet til metoden BeginWrite.</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: At the very minimum, your `state` parameter must contain the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>.
trans-unit.target: På den svært minimums din `state` parameteren må inneholde <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: If your callback needs more information, you can create a small class or structure to hold the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> and the other required information.
trans-unit.target: Hvis tilbakeringing trenger mer informasjon, kan du opprette en liten klasse eller strukturen til å inneholde den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>og den obligatoriske informasjonen.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: Pass the structure or class instance to the BeginWrite method through the `state` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Sende forekomst structure eller klasse til metoden BeginWrite via den `state` parameteren.

trans-unit.source: Your callback method should implement the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndWrite%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Tilbakekallingsmetoden skal implementere den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndWrite%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndWrite%2A>

trans-unit.source: When your application calls BeginWrite, the system uses a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and blocks on <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndWrite%2A> until the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> sends the number of bytes requested or throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Når programmet kaller BeginWrite, systemet bruker en separat tråd til å utføre den angitte tilbakeringing-metoden, og blokkerer på <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndWrite%2A>før den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>sender antall byte som ble forespurt eller oppstår det et unntak.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.EndWrite%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want the original thread to block after you call the BeginWrite method, use the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil den opprinnelige tråden til å blokkere når du kaller BeginWrite-metoden, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.Set%2A> in the callback method when you want the original thread to continue executing.
trans-unit.target: Kall <xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.Set%2A>i metoden tilbakeringing når du ønsker den opprinnelige tråden fortsette kjøring.</xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.Set%2A>

trans-unit.source: For additional information about writing callback methods, see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om hvordan du skriver tilbakeringing metoder, se [formidling representant som en tilbakeringing metode](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis du får en <xref:System.IO.IOException>må du kontrollere <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>til å fastslå om det ble forårsaket av en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.IO.IOException>

trans-unit.source: If so, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A> property to obtain the specific error code, and refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.

trans-unit.target: Hvis CanRead `true`, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>tillater kall til den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: Provide the appropriate <xref:System.IO.FileAccess> enumerated value in the constructor to set the readability and writability of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>.
trans-unit.target: Angi den riktige <xref:System.IO.FileAccess>listes opp verdien i konstruktøren for å angi lese og writability for <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> </xref:System.IO.FileAccess>

trans-unit.source: The CanRead property is set when the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> is initialized.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen CanRead angis når den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>er initialisert.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if data can be read from the stream; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kan lese data fra dataflyten; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the stream supports seeking.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om Dataflyten støtter søking.

trans-unit.source: This property is not currently supported.This property always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen støttes ikke. Denne egenskapen returnerer alltid <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases to indicate that <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref> cannot seek a specific location in the stream.

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>i alle tilfeller.

trans-unit.target: Angi den riktige <xref:System.IO.FileAccess>listes opp verdien i konstruktøren for å angi lese og writability for <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> </xref:System.IO.FileAccess>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if data can be written to the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kan skrive data til den <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Closes the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref> after waiting the specified time to allow data to be sent.
trans-unit.target: Lukker det <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref> etter å ha ventet den angitte tiden for å tillate at data sendes.

trans-unit.source: The Close method frees both unmanaged and managed resources associated with the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Close frigjør både uforvaltede og behandlede ressurser som er knyttet til <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> owns the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, it is closed as well.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>eier den underliggende <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, den er lukket samt.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> was associated with a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>, the Close method will close the TCP connection, but not dispose of the associated <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>er knyttet til en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>metoden Close lukkes TCP-tilkobling, men ikke Kast tilknyttede <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer that specifies the number of milliseconds to wait to send any remaining data before closing.
trans-unit.target: En 32-biters heltall med fortegn som angir antall millisekunder det skal ventes sende gjenværende data før du lukker.

trans-unit.source: The timeout parameter is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: Den timeout parameteren er mindre enn -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether data is available on the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref> to be read.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om data er tilgjengelig på den <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref> leses.

trans-unit.source: Use the DataAvailable property to determine if data is ready to be read.
trans-unit.target: Bruk DataAvailable-egenskapen til å finne ut om dataene er klar til å lese.

trans-unit.source: If DataAvailable is `true`, a call to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A> returns immediately.
trans-unit.target: Hvis DataAvailable `true`, et kall til <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A>returnerer umiddelbart.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the remote host shuts down or closes the connection, DataAvailable may throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den eksterne verten avsluttes eller lukker tilkoblingen, kan DataAvailable throw <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if data is available on the stream to be read; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis data er tilgjengelig for dataflyten leses; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref> is closed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref> er lukket.

trans-unit.source: The underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> is closed.
trans-unit.target: Den underliggende <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>er lukket.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to obtain the specific error code, and refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> til å hente feilkoden og i Windows Sockets versjon 2 API feil kode dokumentasjonen i MSDN for en detaljert beskrivelse av feilen.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref> og eventuelt frigir administrerte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av offentlig `Dispose` metoden og <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metode.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`Aktiverer den beskyttede `Dispose(Boolean)` metoden med den `disposing` parameteren satt til `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>aktiverer `Dispose` med `disposing` satt til `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> references.
trans-unit.target: Når den `disposing` parameteren er `true`, denne metoden Frigjør alle ressurser holdes av administrerte objekter som denne <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>referanser.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden starter den `Dispose` metode for hver referert objekt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å frigjøre både administrerte og uforvaltede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Handles the end of an asynchronous read.
trans-unit.target: Behandler slutten av en asynkron lesing.

trans-unit.source: The EndRead method completes the asynchronous read operation started in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: EndRead-metoden fullfører asynkrone leseoperasjonen startet i den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: Before calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A>, you need to create a callback method that implements the <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate.
trans-unit.target: Før du kaller <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A>, må du opprette en tilbakeringing metode som implementerer den <xref:System.AsyncCallback>delegere.</xref:System.AsyncCallback> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: This callback method executes in a separate thread and is called by the system after <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A> returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne tilbakeringing-metoden utføres i en separat tråd og kalles av systemet etter <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A>returnerer.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: The callback method must accept the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> returned from the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A> method as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: Metoden tilbakeringing må godta de <xref:System.IAsyncResult>returnert fra den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A>metoden som en parameter.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Within the callback method, call the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A> property of the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> to obtain the state object passed to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: I metoden tilbakeringing kalle den <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A>for den <xref:System.IAsyncResult>ikke hente tilstanden-objektet som ble sendt til den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A> </xref:System.IAsyncResult> </xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Extract the receiving <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> from this state object.
trans-unit.target: Trekk ut motta <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>fra dette tilstand-objektet.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: After obtaining the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>, call the EndRead method to successfully complete the read operation and return the number of bytes read.
trans-unit.target: Etter henting av <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>, kalle metoden EndRead for å fullføre leseoperasjonen ble og returnere antall byte som leses.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: The EndRead method blocks until data is available.
trans-unit.target: Blokker med EndRead-metoden før data er tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: The EndRead method reads as much data as is available up to the number of bytes specified in the `size` parameter of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden EndRead leser så mye data som er tilgjengelig opptil antall byte som er angitt i den `size` -parameteren for den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the remote host shuts down the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> connection and all available data has been received, the EndRead method completes immediately and returns zero bytes.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den eksterne verten avsluttes den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>tilkoblingen og alle tilgjengelige data er mottatt, metoden EndRead umiddelbart er fullført, og returnerer null byte.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: To obtain the received data, call the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A> property of the <xref:System.IAsyncResult>, and extract the buffer contained in the resulting state object.
trans-unit.target: For å få den mottatte data, kan du kalle den <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A>for den <xref:System.IAsyncResult>, og Pakk ut bufferen finnes i de resulterende tilstand-objektet.</xref:System.IAsyncResult> </xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you receive an <xref:System.IO.IOException>, check the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property to determine if it was caused by a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis du får en <xref:System.IO.IOException>må du kontrollere <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>til å fastslå om det ble forårsaket av en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.IO.IOException>

trans-unit.source: If so, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A> property to obtain the specific error code, and refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: Hvis dette er tilfellet, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A>til å hente feilkoden og i Windows Sockets versjon 2 API feil kode dokumentasjonen i MSDN for en detaljert beskrivelse av feilen.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handles the end of an asynchronous write.

trans-unit.source: EndWrite completes the asynchronous send operation started in <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A>.
trans-unit.target: EndWrite er fullført asynkrone sendeoperasjonen startet i <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A>

trans-unit.source: Before calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A>, you need to create a callback method that implements the <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate.
trans-unit.target: Før du kaller <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A>, må du opprette en tilbakeringing metode som implementerer den <xref:System.AsyncCallback>delegere.</xref:System.AsyncCallback> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A>

trans-unit.source: This callback method executes in a separate thread and is called by the system after <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A> returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne tilbakeringing-metoden utføres i en separat tråd og kalles av systemet etter <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A>returnerer.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A>

trans-unit.source: The callback method must accept the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> returned from the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A> method as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: Metoden tilbakeringing må godta de <xref:System.IAsyncResult>returnert fra den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A>metoden som en parameter.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Within the callback method, call the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A> property of the `IAsyncResult` parameter to obtain the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>.
trans-unit.target: I metoden tilbakeringing kalle den <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A>for den `IAsyncResult` parameter for å hente <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> </xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A>

trans-unit.source: After obtaining the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>, you can call the EndWrite method to successfully complete the send operation and return the number of bytes sent.
trans-unit.target: Etter henting av <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>, kan du kalle metoden EndWrite for å fullføre sendeoperasjonen og returnere antall byte sendt ble.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: The EndWrite method blocks until the requested number of bytes are sent.
trans-unit.target: Blokker med EndWrite-metoden til ønsket antall byte som er sendt.

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden overstyrer <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Application code should not call this method; an object's <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Applikasjons-koden kan ikke kalle denne metoden. et objekts <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metode startes automatisk under datasanering, med mindre finalization av saneringsoppsamlingen er deaktivert av et kall til den <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about using the Finalize method, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du bruker metoden Fullfør [fullføre metoder og destruktører](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Rydder opp uforvaltede ressurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), og [overstyrer metoden fullføre](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Flushes data from the stream.
trans-unit.target: Tømmer data fra dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: This method is reserved for future use.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er reservert for fremtidig bruk.

trans-unit.source: The Flush method implements the <xref:System.IO.Stream.Flush%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method; however, because <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> is not buffered, it has no affect on network streams.
trans-unit.target: Metoden tømming implementerer den <xref:System.IO.Stream.Flush%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden; imidlertid fordi <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>er ikke bufres den har ingen innvirkning på nettverket flyter.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> </xref:System.IO.Stream.Flush%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Calling the Flush method does not throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Kaller metoden tømming ikke Iverksett et unntak.

trans-unit.source: Flushes data from the stream as an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Tømmer data fra dataflyten som en asynkron operasjon.

trans-unit.source: This operation will not block.
trans-unit.target: Denne operasjonen blokkere ikke.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> object will complete after data has been flushed from the stream for the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> instance.
trans-unit.target: Det returnerte <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>objektet fullfører etter at dataene har blitt tømt fra dataflyten for den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>forekomsten.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> </xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>

trans-unit.source: A cancellation token used to propagate notification that this operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Et avbryte token brukes til å overføre varsling at denne operasjonen kan avbrytes.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>.</xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>

trans-unit.source: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Oppgaveobjektet som representerer den asynkrone operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Reads data from the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Viser data fra den <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method reads data into the `buffer` parameter and returns the number of bytes successfully read.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden viser data i den `buffer` parameteren og returnerer antall byte som ble lest.

trans-unit.source: If no data is available for reading, the Read method returns 0.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen data er tilgjengelig for lesing, returneres lese 0.

trans-unit.source: The Read operation reads as much data as is available, up to the number of bytes specified by the `size` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Leseoperasjon leser så mye data som er tilgjengelig, opptil antall byte som er angitt av den `size` parameteren.

trans-unit.source: If the remote host shuts down the connection, and all available data has been received, the Read method completes immediately and return zero bytes.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den eksterne verten slås av tilkoblingen, og alle tilgjengelige data er mottatt Read-metoden fullfører umiddelbart, og returnerer null byte.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Check to see if the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> is readable by calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanRead%2A> property.

trans-unit.source: You must derive from the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> class to use the Readable property.
trans-unit.target: Du må være utledet fra den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>klassen for å bruke egenskapen lesbar.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: If Readable is `true`, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> allows calls to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis Readable `true`, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>tillater kall til den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: You can also determine whether a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> is readable by checking the publicly accessible <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanRead%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi om en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>kan leses ved å kontrollere den allment tilgjengelige <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanRead%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanRead%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: The Readable property is set when the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> is initialized.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen lesbar angis når den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>er initialisert.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref> can be read; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å angi at den <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref> kan være skrivebeskyttet; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of time that a read operation blocks waiting for data.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hvor lang tid som en leseoperasjonen som venter på at data.

trans-unit.source: If the read operation does not complete within the time specified by this property, the read operation throws an <xref:System.IO.IOException>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis leseoperasjonen ikke fullfører innen angitt av denne egenskapen, oppstår leseoperasjonen en <xref:System.IO.IOException>.</xref:System.IO.IOException>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property affects only synchronous reads performed by calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne egenskapen påvirker bare synkron leseoperasjoner utføres ved kall av <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A>metode.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property does not affect asynchronous reads performed by calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen påvirker ikke asynkron leser utføres ved kall fra den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Int32> that specifies the amount of time, in milliseconds, that will elapse before a read operation fails.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>som angir hvor lang tid, i millisekunder det skal gå før en leseoperasjon mislykkes.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The default value, <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>, specifies that the read operation does not time out.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>, angir leseoperasjonen er tidsavbrutt.</xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>

trans-unit.source: The value specified is less than or equal to zero and is not <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien er mindre enn eller lik null, og er ikke <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>.</xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>

trans-unit.source: Sets the current position of the stream to the given value.
trans-unit.target: Angir gjeldende plassering i dataflyten for den angitte verdien.

trans-unit.source: This method is not currently supported and always throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden støttes ikke og oppstår alltid <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: Denne parameteren brukes ikke.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: Denne parameteren brukes ikke.

trans-unit.source: The position in the stream.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen i dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: Any use of this property.
trans-unit.target: Bruken av denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: Sets the length of the stream.
trans-unit.target: Angir lengden på dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: This method always throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden oppstår alltid <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: Denne parameteren brukes ikke.

trans-unit.source: Any use of this property.
trans-unit.target: Bruken av denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: Henter den underliggende <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> can use this property to get the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: Klasser som er avledet fra <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>kan bruke denne egenskapen for å få den underliggende <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: Use the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> returned from the Socket property if you require access beyond that which <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> provides.
trans-unit.target: Bruk den underliggende <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>returnert fra egenskapen Socket Hvis du trenger tilgang enn det som <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>gir.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is accessible only through this class or a derived class.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne egenskapen er kun tilgjengelig gjennom denne klasse eller en avledet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> that represents the underlying network connection.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>som representerer underliggende nettverkstilkoblingen.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: Writes data to the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Skriver data til den <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Write method starts at the specified `offset` and sends `size` bytes from the contents of `buffer` to the network.
trans-unit.target: Write-metoden starter på den angitte `offset` og sender `size` byte fra innholdet i `buffer` til nettverket.

trans-unit.source: The Write method blocks until the requested number of bytes is sent or a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Write-metoden blokkerer til ønsket antall byte sendt eller en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>forårsakes.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to obtain the specific error code, and refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du får en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, bruker du <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>til å hente feilkoden og i Windows Sockets versjon 2 API feil kode dokumentasjonen i MSDN for en detaljert beskrivelse av feilen.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Check to see if the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> is writable by accessing the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanWrite%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Kontroller om det <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>skrives ved å åpne den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanWrite%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanWrite%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to write to a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> that is not writable, you will get an <xref:System.IO.IOException>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du prøver å skrive til en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>som er ikke skrivbar, får du en <xref:System.IO.IOException>.</xref:System.IO.IOException> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: If you receive an <xref:System.IO.IOException>, check the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property to determine if it was caused by a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du får en <xref:System.IO.IOException>må du kontrollere <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>til å fastslå om det ble forårsaket av en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.IO.IOException>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref:System.Byte> that contains the data to write to the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av typen <xref:System.Byte>som inneholder dataene for å skrive til den <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref>.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: The location in `buffer` from which to start writing data.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen i `buffer` som begynner å skrive data.

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to write to the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Antall byte ikke skrive til den <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The buffer parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The buffer parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The offset parameter is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: Den offset parameteren er mindre enn 0.

trans-unit.source: -or- The offset parameter is greater than the length of buffer.
trans-unit.target: - eller - offset parameteren er større enn lengden på buffer .

trans-unit.source: -or- The size parameter is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: - eller - size parameteren er mindre enn 0.

trans-unit.source: -or- The size parameter is greater than the length of buffer minus the value of the offset parameter.
trans-unit.target: - eller - size parameteren er større enn lengden på buffer minus verdien for den offset parameteren.

trans-unit.source: There was a failure while writing to the network.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en feil under skriving til nettverket.

trans-unit.source: -or- An error occurred when accessing the socket.
trans-unit.target: - eller - det oppstod en feilen under tilgang til socket.

trans-unit.source: See the Remarks section for more information.
trans-unit.target: Se kommentarer for mer informasjon.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref> is closed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref> er lukket.

trans-unit.source: -or- There was a failure reading from the network.
trans-unit.target: - eller - det oppstod en feil under lesing fra nettverket.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"></xref> is writable.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream"> </xref> skrives.

trans-unit.source: You must derive from the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> class to use the Writeable property.
trans-unit.target: Du må være utledet fra den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>klassen for å bruke egenskapen skrivbar.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: If Writeable is `true`, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> allows calls to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis Writeable `true`, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>tillater kall til den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: You can also determine whether a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> is writable by checking the publicly accessible <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanWrite%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi om en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>skrives ved å kontrollere den allment tilgjengelige <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanWrite%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.CanWrite%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: The Writeable property is set when the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> is initialized.
trans-unit.target: Writeable-egenskapen er angitt når den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>er initialisert.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if data can be written to the stream; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kan skrive data til dataflyten; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of time that a write operation blocks waiting for data.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hvor lang tid som en skrive operasjonen som venter på at data.

trans-unit.source: If the write operation does not complete within the time specified by this property, the write operation throws a <xref:System.IO.IOException>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis Skriveoperasjonen ikke fullfører innen angitt av denne egenskapen, oppstår Skriveoperasjonen <xref:System.IO.IOException>.</xref:System.IO.IOException>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property affects only synchronous write operations performed by calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne egenskapen påvirker bare synkron skriving operasjoner som utføres ved kall av <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A>metode.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property does not affect asynchronous writes performed by calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen påvirker ikke asynkron skriving utføres ved kall av <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A>metode.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.BeginWrite%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Int32> that specifies the amount of time, in milliseconds, that will elapse before a write operation fails.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>som angir hvor lang tid, i millisekunder det skal gå før en skriveoperasjon mislykkes.</xref:System.Int32>
